comments.author: oooooooo
comments.body_markdown: ```js const element = document.createElement('a') //=> element.innerHTML = 'hello' //=> hello element.textContent = 'helo' //=> hello element.href = '#' element.outerHTML //=> 'helo' ``` [Document.createElement() - Web APIs | MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/createElement) [node-html-parser - npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-html-parser) もある attribute を取り出す正規表現。複数あると値の前後に ["'] が付く html - Regular expression for extracting tag attributes - Stack Overflow https://stackoverflow.com/questions/317053/regular-expression-for-extracting-tag-attributes
